IndexPage.digitalMaturityDescription: Take the digital maturity survey for your business.
IndexPage.adminDescription: Admin page for viewing survey results.
IndexPage.mainTitle: Assessment of the digital maturity of public services and SME digital maturity
IndexPage.mainDescription: Take part in the survey for a comprehensive assessment of the digital maturity level of your organization - a government agency or enterprise. The results will allow you to determine the current stage of digital development, identify key limitations and receive targeted recommendations for overcoming them. This will form the basis for planning effective steps aimed at improving the quality of work, the level of services provided and the competitiveness of your organization in the digital environment.

SurveyPage.inDevelopmentDescription: This section will be available soon.
